name: Retro Rockets
description:
HuntHunt down Retronauts and deorbit space stations! This is what you will be doing as the killer robot, Destructo! Use your abilities and weapons to get the upper hand as the perfect ambush predator.SurviveWork together and activate the security system as the Retronauts. The security system will make sure Destructo will rest in pieces! Try not to get caught because there is only so much you can do to resist this dangerous robot. Use your weapons, your gadgets and teamwork to defend yourselves.AvengeDestructo will need to be careful when killing Retronauts, because every dead Retronaut will return as an indestructible Securobot. Build with only one purpose in mind, these robots can secure a space station with 400 rounds per minute. Time to avenge the fallen Retronauts!70s in SpaaaacceeEver wondered what would happen if you combine the interior design of the 1970's with space stations? Find out aboard the space stations in Retro Rockets! Each with their own theme, playstyle and backstory. A luxury hotel in orbit around Earth, a corn farm burried on top of an asteroid or the headquarters of the company who build them all, C-R.A.P..Lock and LoadEarn credits by completing your missions! Use these credits to buy new weapons, gadgets and abilities in the store. You can also use the credits to extend your wardrobe by buying new skins, helmets and other ornaments. The possibilities are, almost, endless!
Purely ingame, no microtransations.
